1.「キヒヒヒ！| また 来おったか エテーネの民よ！| 今度こそ お前たちの 息の: Kee-hee-hee! So, you've come again, people of|Ethene! This time, you won't live to see|another day!

2.「時を超えるチカラを秘めた お前たちに| テンスの花を渡すわけには いかんからの: You have the power to transcend time, and I|will not let you have the Tens Flower!

5.「アバさまが 乗っていいって| 言ってくれたんだ！: Elder Abba said I could ride with her!

8.「村の守り神 カメさまの お背中に| 乗せていただく日が 来ようとは……。| 長: I never thought the day would come when I|could ride on the back of the Galapagod, our|guardian deity...it pays to live a long life.

9.「さあ 行くぞ <kyodai>。| 他の者たちも 乗せてやらねば。: Let's get going, <kyodai>.|We need to let the others ride, too.

11.<if_woman>「さあ！ 姉ちゃんも 乗って乗って！| ほら おいらの手に: <if_woman>Come on, sis! Get on, get on! Here,|take my hand...<else>Come on, bro! Get on, get on! Here,|take my hand...<endif>

21.「おや まだ寝てたのかい？| あんたにしちゃ めずらしいね。: Oh, you're still asleep, huh? That's pretty|unusual for you, isn't it?

23.「錬金術で ハツラツ豆を| １０倍に増やすって言ったのに 失敗して| 全部 灰に: They said they were going to use alchemy to|increase our crop of Pep Beans tenfold, but|they failed and all the beans turned to ash!

24.「今年最後の ハツラツ豆を……。| アバさまが とーっても| 楽しみにしてらっし: The last of this year's Pep Beans...|Abba's been looking forward to them sooo|much... Isn't it just awful?

25.「あんたの <kyodai_rel2>の失敗なんだから| 代わりに アバさまに: And it's YOUR <kyodai_rel2>'s fault, so|you need to go apologize to Abba in their|stead.

26.「言うまでもないけど アバさまの家は| 橋向こうの高台にある 大きな家だからね。: Not that I need to tell you, but Abba's house|is the big house on the hill over the bridge.|I'm counting on you!

28.「シンイっ！| やっと眠れそうなところだったのに| よくも くだらんことで ジャ: Shini! Just when I was about to get some|sleep, you interrupt me with this nonsense!

29.「す すみません……。| じつは ハツラツ豆が なくなってしまったので| その代: S-sorry... I was actually hoping to replace|the Pep Beans we ran out of, but...

35.「豆が どうのなどと| 言っておられる時では ないわ！: Now is not the time to be talking about beans!

36.「おお <pc>ではないか！| ちょうどよいところに 来てくれたな。| じつは: Oh, if it isn't <pc>!|How nice that you're here. Actually, there's|something I need to tell you...

37.「……と <kyodai>は 一緒ではないのか？| やれやれ。どうでもいい時には: ...<kyodai> isn't with you? Sheesh...they|show up when I don't need them, but when|I DO need them, they're nowhere to be found.

38.「すまぬが <kyodai>を 呼んできてくれ。| お前たち<pc_rel3>が: I'm sorry, but you'll need to go get <kyodai>.|There's something I want to tell all of you|together.

39.「ありがとうございます！| では 失礼して……| さっそく 作らせていただきます: Thank you so much! Now, if you'll excuse|me...I'm gonna start making it right away.

40.「<pc>さんは| ご存知なかったかもしれませんが……。| じつは 私…… さい: I don't know if you knew this, but...I'm|actually...pretty good at sewing.

41.「おばあさまの服も| いつも 私が作っているんですよ。: I always make my grandmother's clothes for|her.

43.「ほら！ 香りも 肌ざわりも 申し分ない。| 最高の安眠まくらの 完成です！: Have a look! The texture, the aroma...it's all|just right. The perfect pillow for a|good night's sleep!

44.「<pc>さんが 集めてくださった| もみガラと お茶の葉の効果で| おばあさま: Those Fluffy Rice Husks and Dried Antidotal|Herbs you collected are going to help grandma|sleep much more soundly, <pc>!

45.「さあ！ さっそく おばあさまに| 使っていただきましょう！| 一緒に 向かいの: Come on! Let's give it to her right now!|Follow me, her room's on the opposite side|of the house!

46.「これと これも 入れて……| フタを閉めて……。: Put this one here, and that one there...|Close the lid...

47.「よーし……。| 今度こそ すっごいのが できるぞ。| きっと……。: O-kay...it's gonna be great this time. I'm|sure of it...

50.「やったあっ！| なんか すっごいの できた！: Yes, I did it! I really made something|amazing!

52.<if_woman>「いいところに来たね！| これ…… 姉ちゃんに プレゼント！: <if_woman>I'm happy you came! This is...|A present for my sister! I think you'll like|it!<else>I'm happy you came! This is...|A present for my brother! I think you'll like|it!<endif>

54.「あれ？ かばんが いっぱいだね。| しょうがないから おいらが 持っておくよ。: Huh? Your bag's full... oh well. I'll hang|onto it for you.

55.<if_woman>「で 姉ちゃんは こんな所まで| わざわざ なにしに来たの？: So, what did you come all the way out here|for, anyway?

56.「……えっ？| アバさまが おいらを呼んでる？: ...Huh? Lady Abba wants to see me?

58.「それって ついに アバさまが| おいらの錬金術を 頼りにする日が| 来たってこ: Does this mean that the day has finally come|where Lady Abba has no choice but to rely on|my alchemy?!

59.<if_woman>「さあ 姉ちゃん！| アバさまの所へ 行こう～！ おいらが作: <if_woman>Come on, sis! Let's go to Abba's! Don't forget|the hat I made for you!<else>Come on, bro! Let's go to Abba's! Don't forget|the hat I made for you!<endif>

62.「<pc>さん。私が 起こしますよ。| 寝起きの おばあさまは 機嫌が悪いので…: Let me be the one to wake her,|<pc>. Grandmother is always in a|bad mood when she first wakes...

63.「失礼します おばあさま。| <pc>さんが <kyodai>さんを| 連れてい: Excuse me, Grandmother.|<pc> brought <kyodai> back with them.

68.「……おかげで 寝覚めも よかった。| なかなか いい まくらじゃったぞい。: Thanks to that pillow you made, I slept like|a baby. It's very well-made.

71.「では シンイ！ 村の者たちを集めよ！| これより カメさまのお告げを 皆に伝え: Now, Shini! Gather the villagers! I will|now reveal to them what the Galapagod has told|me!

73.「エテーネの民たちよ！| 心して 聞くがよい！: People of Ethene! Listen to me carefully!

74.「わしは カメさまからの お告げをたまわる| 巫女として 託された お告げを|: As the priestess responsible for receiving|omens from the Galapagod, I will now tell|you what he has told me!

75.「まもなく このエテーネの村は……: Soon, the village of Ethene will be...

76.「大いなる災厄に見舞われ 滅びる！| エテーネの民は ひとり残らず| 死に絶える: ...destroyed by a great calamity! Every last|person in this village will die!

78.「エテーネの民は 死に絶えるだろう……| だが 光明が 残されていないわけではな: The people of Ethene will all die...|However, there is still a light of hope left!

79.「北の 清き水の洞くつに咲く 伝説の霊草| テンスの花があれば 滅びの運命から|: To the north, in the Clear Water Cave, grows|a legendary flower called the Tens Flower.|With it, we can escape this horrible fate!

80.「テンスの花を 採りにいくのは| わしの孫のシンイと <pc>！: <pc> and my grandson Shini will go and|collect the Tens Flowers!

81.「そして……<kyodai>！| この ３名じゃ！: And... <kyodai> as well!|The three of you!

82.「大いなる災厄は そこまで迫っておる！| だが わしも チカラを尽くす！: A great calamity is upon us! But I will do|everything in my power!

83.「このわしが カメさまと共に| エテーネの村を 守りきってみせるわ！！: The Galapagod and I will defend Ethene|Village!

85.「さあ 急ぎましょう！ 清き水の洞くつは| 育みの大地よりも はるか遠い 北にあ: We have to hurry! The Clear Water Cave is far|to the north past the Nurturing Land. Let's|pray at my house, then leave right away!

88.<center>冥王のチカラにより|あなたの命は尽きましたが その魂には|まだ: Your life has been cut short by the Dark|Lord's power, but your soul yet has a mission|to fulfill.

89.<center>隔絶された島で 生きてきた|あなたたち エテーネの民は|知らない: You and the rest of the people of Ethene, who|lived on this isolated island, could never|have known...

90.<center>これより ５人の神々が|あなたに チカラを貸してくれます。: From now on, the Five Gods will lend you their|strength...

91.<center>さあ 神の像の前にゆき|どの姿に生まれ変わるか 決めるのです。: Now, go before the images of the gods and|decide into which form you shall be reborn.

103.<if_woman>「イヤだよ！ 姉ちゃん！！| おいらを ひとりにしないで！！: <if_woman>No! Sis! Please don't leave me!!<else>No! Bro! Please don't leave me!!<endif>

111.「くっくっく…… 見たぞ！: Keh heh heh... I saw that!

112.「こいつです 冥王さま！| あの術を 使いやがったのはっ！: It's him, Dark Lord! He's the one that used|that technique!

113.「やはり 時渡りの術を使う者が 現れたか。: I knew it. So, you've finally shown yourself,|time traveler...

114.「だが ネズミ１匹 逃がしたところで| この冥王ネルゲルを 阻むことはできぬ。: But even if I let one little rat escape, I,|the Netherlord Nergel, cannot be stopped.

115.「冥王とは あまねく 死を統べる者。| 生きとし生ける者が 死から逃れられぬよう: The Dark Lord is he who commands dominion over|death. Just as no mortal being can escape|death, none shall escape me.

116.「いまわしき 時渡りの術者よ！| 灼熱の獄炎で その身を 焼き尽くしてやろう！: O disgraceful traveler of time! I will burn|you to ashes in a hellish inferno!

135.「<pc>か！？| くそっ！ 余計なことすんじゃねえ！！| オレと お前は 死ぬ: <pc>?! Damn it! Don't be reckless!|We're supposed to be together, even in death!!

137.<if_woman>「イヤだよ！ お姉ちゃん！！| 私を ひとりにしないで！！<: <if_woman>No! Sis! Don't leave me alone!<else>No! Big brother! Don't leave me alone!<endif>

153.「冥王さま……！| 時を 超える…… エテーネの民は……| め…冥王さまの 手で: Dark Lord...!|May the time traveling people of Ethene...|be destroyed...by your hand!

154.「ど どうしよう……。| テンスの花が 全部 焼けちゃった……。: What do we do now...?|He burned all the Tens Flowers...

155.「時を超えるとかなんとか| わけのわからないこと言って| おいらたちの ジャマを: How dare he mess with us by saying something|ridiculous like "transcending time".

157.「私たち エテーネの民は はるか昔| 自由に時を超えられる 時渡りの術という能力: Long ago, we, the people of Ethene, possessed|the ability to travel through time at will.

158.「ですが 時渡りの術を使える者は| 時代と共に 少なくなっていき| 数百年前に: However, the number of people with that power|dwindled over time...and hundreds of years|ago, the ability was completely lost...

159.「そうだったんだ……。| 今はもうない能力なのに そのために| こんな目にあわさ: So then...we're being punished for an ability|we no longer have. It's not fair!

160.「ダメだ…… 見つからない……。| テンスの花が １本でも残っていれば| おばあ: It's no use... I can't find any... If even one|was left, I could've fulfilled Grandmother's|wishes!

161.「……仕方ありません。村に帰りましょう。| 他に 大いなる災厄を止める手立てが|: ...We did what we could. Let's return to the|village. Perhaps there are other ways to|prevent the disaster.

169.「よくぞ 見つけてくださいました！| これさえあれば 村を……| 滅びの運命から: Great work! With this, we might be able to|save the village from destruction!

170.「よかった。| おいらも 役に立てたんだね！: Thank goodness. I'm glad I was able to help!

171.<if_woman>「きっと ここで テンスの花を見つけるのが| おいらの役目だ: <if_woman>I'm sure it was my duty to find the Tens|Flower... Sis, thank you for bringing me here!<else>I'm sure it was my duty to find the Tens|Flower... Thank you for bringing me here, bro!<endif>

177.「時を超えるとかなんとか| わけのわからないことを言って| オレたちの ジャマし: How dare you mess with us by saying something|ridiculous like "transcending time".

178.「時を超えるとかなんとか| わけのわかんないこと言って| あたしたちの ジャマを: How dare you mess with us by saying something|ridiculous like "transcending time".

179.「時を超えるとかなんとか| わけのわからないこと言って 私たちの| ジャマをする: I can't believe they'd mess with us by saying|something ridiculous like "transcending|time".

180.「そうだったのか……。| 今はもうない能力なのに そのために| こんな目にあわさ: So then... why do we have to be put through|all this if we lost that power?

181.「そうだったんだ……。| 今はもうない能力なのに そのために| こんな目にあわさ: So then... if we've lost that power, why do|we have to go through all this?!

182.「そうだったんだ……。| 今はもうない能力なのに そのために| こんな目にあわさ: So then... it's a power we no longer have, and|we're being put through this anyways.

192.「へっへ～ん。| さすが オレだぜ！: Heh heh... Leave it to me!

193.「ふふん！| みんな あたしに感謝してよねっ！: Hmph! You all should be thanking me!

194.「えへへへ……。| 私も 役に立てて うれしいな～！: Ehehe... I'm glad that I could help, too!

195.「たぶん ここで テンスの花を見つけるのが| オレの役目だったのかもな！ <pc: Maybe it really was my duty to come here and|find the Tens Flower...<pc>, thanks|for bringing me here!

196.「きっと ここで テンスの花を見つけるのが| あたしの役目だったのね。<pc>|: I guess my role in all this was to find the|Tens Flower here. <pc>, thank you|for bringing me along!

197.<if_woman>「きっと ここで テンスの花を見つけるのが| 私の役目だった: <if_woman>I'm sure it was my duty to find the Tens|Flowers here. Thank you for bringing me|here, big sister!<else>I'm sure it was my duty to find the Tens|Flowers here. Thank you for bringing me|here, big brother!<endif>

198.「ここです。| テンスの花は この扉の向こうに咲いていると| 書物に 記されてい: This is the place. I've read that the Tens|Flowers bloom behind this door.

199.「最後に この扉が開かれたのは| いったい いつのことか| 私には 想像もつきま: I can't imagine how long it's been since this|door was last opened...

200.「この洞くつに流れる 清き水が 今も| テンスの花を 育み続けてくれているはず。: I'm sure that the clear water flowing through|this cave is nuturing the Tens Flowers even|now.

202.「いまわしき テンスの花は| この魔導鬼ベドラーさまが| すべて 焼き尽くしてく: All of the Tens Flowers will be burned to ash|by me, the great Sorcerer Bedora!

204.「キヒヒヒ！ お前らは エテーネの民か！: Kee-hee-hee! You're all from Ethene, aren't|you?

205.「じゃが そうはいかんぞ！| 時を超えるチカラを秘めた お前たちに| この花を渡: But that's not going to happen! You have the|power to transcend time, so I can't let you|have these flowers!

207.「じつは おばあさまが 気になることを| つぶやいていらっしゃったのです。: The truth is, I heard Grandmother whispering|something that's been bothering me.

209.「たとえ 滅亡の運命から| 逃れることが できたとしても……: Even if we do escape our fate of extinction...

212.「ひとりって…… それって……| 他の人は みんな 死んじゃうってこと？: Just one person... does that mean....|Everyone else is going to die?

213.「それは 私にも わかりませんが| 言葉のままに 受け取るなら| そういうことだ: I don't know exactly what she meant, but if|you take it at face value, then that would|be the case, I think.

215.「気を落とさないでください。| ……おそらく おばあさまは| 最悪の場合のことを: Don't lose hope. Perhaps Grandmother was only|referring to the worst-case scenario.

216.「カメさまの お告げどおり| テンスの花さえあれば 村は助かるとも| おばあさま: The Galapagod told Grandmother that if we|bring back the Tens Flowers, the village|will be saved.

217.「だから 今は おばあさまの言葉を信じて| 必ず テンスの花を 村へ持ちかえりま: So for now, let's believe in her words and|bring the flowers back to the village!

218.「そうだよね……！ おいらも信じる！| テンスの花さえあれば| みんな助かるって: That's right...! I believe it, too! As long|as we get the Tens Flowers, we can save|everyone!

225.「ひとりって…… それって……| 他のヤツは みんな 死んじまうってことか？: Just one person... does that mean....|Everyone else is going to die?

231.「そうだよな……！ オレも信じる！| テンスの花さえあれば| みんな助かるって: That's right...! I believe it, too! As long|as we get the Tens Flowers, we can save|everyone!

232.「そうよね……！ あたしも信じるわ！| テンスの花さえあれば| みんな助かるって: That's right...! I believe it, too! As long|as we get the Tens Flowers, we can save|everyone!

233.「そうだよね……！ 私も信じる！| テンスの花さえあれば| みんな助かるって 信: That's right...! I believe it, too! As long|as we get the Tens Flowers, we can save|everyone!

234.<pc>は|岩に 刻まれている文字を 読んだ。: <pc> read the words carved into the|rock.

235.<center>この世界で 平和に 暮らしていた|すべての 生きとし生ける者は|: All living beings, who until now had lived|peacefully in this world, are now faced with|extinction.

236.<center>今 空には ふたつの太陽が 昇っている。|ふたつめの太陽…… そ: Two suns now rise in the sky. The second sun|has made this world hell since it appeared...

237.<center>いまわしき ふたつめの太陽は 自在に空を駆け|大地を焼き 海を干: The horrible second sun races across the sky,|scorching the earth, drying the seas, and|sending all peoples into a searing despair.

238.<center>太陽が ふたつになった理由など 知る由もない。|わかっていること: No one knows where the second sun came from.|All we know is that all life on this world|will soon perish.

239.「こんな所にも いしずえの森と同じような| 壁画があったのですね。: I didn't know about this mural. It's just like|the one in Cornerstone Forest.

241.「……私は 以前から| いしずえの森の岩に 描かれていた絵を| 不思議な気持ちで: ...For a long time, I've looked at the murals|on the rocks in Cornerstone Forest with a|sense of wonder.

242.「人間以外の種族が 本当にいたのだとしたら| 彼らは どこに行ってしまったのだろ: If there really were species other than|humans, I wonder where they've gone...

243.「もしかしたら ここに書かれているとおり| ほとんどの者たちが滅亡し…… 私たち: Perhaps, as it says here, most of them|perished...and we humans were the only ones|who survived.

247.「これと これも 入れるだろ……| んで フタを閉めて……。: I'll put this in, and this too...then close|the lid...

248.「これと これも 入れて……| フタを閉めるでしょ……。: I'll put this in, and this too...then close|the lid...

249.「これと これも 入れて……| フタを閉めて……。: Put this one here, and that one there...|Close the lid...

250.「よーし……。| 今度こそ すっげえのが できるぜ。| たぶんよ……！: Alright... This time, I'm really going to make|something amazing. Here's hoping...!

251.「うーん……。| 今度こそ すっごいのが できそうなんだけど。| たぶん……。: Hmm... I think this one is gonna turn out|great. Maybe...

252.「よーし……。| 今度こそ すっごいのが できちゃうよ。| きっと……。: Okay... This time I'm going to make|something amazing. I'm sure of it...

253.「よっしゃあっ！| ホントに すっげえのが できたぜっ！: Oh yeah! I've made something REALLY awesome!

254.「やったあっ！| なんか すっごいの できちゃった！: I did it! I really did it!

255.「やったあっ！| なんか すっごいのが できたよ～！: I did it! I've really made something amazing!

259.「ちょうど いいところに来たな！| ほらよっ！ お前に プレゼントだ！| 絶対: Nice to see you! Look! I have something for|you! I think you'll like it!

260.「いいところに来たわね！| これ…… <pc>に あげるわ。| きっと 似合うと: Perfect timing! This is for you, <pc>!|I think you'll look great in it!

261.<if_woman>「いいところに来たね～！| これ…… お姉ちゃんに プレゼン: <if_woman>Perfect timing! It's a present for my you, big|sister! You'll look great in it!<else>Perfect timing! It's a present for you, big|brother! You'll look great in it!<endif>

262.「えーっ かばんが いっぱいなのかよ。| しょうがねえなあ。オレが 持っといてや: Huh? Your bag is full? Oh well. I'll hang onto|it for you for now.

263.「ちょっと！ かばんが いっぱいじゃないの。| しょうがないわね。あたしが 持っ: Wait! Your bag's full. Oh well. I'll take it|off your hands for now!

264.「あれ？ かばんが いっぱいなの？| じゃあ 私が 持っててあげるね！: Huh? Your bag's full? In that case, I'll hold|onto it for you.

265.「で <pc>は こんな所まで| なにしに来たんだ？: So then, what are you doing here?

266.「で <pc>は こんな所まで| わざわざ なにしに来たってわけ？: So what are you doing all the way out here,|anyway?

267.<if_woman>「で お姉ちゃんは こんな所まで来て| なんの用事？<els: <if_woman>What are you doing all the way out here,|big sister?<else>What are you doing all the way out here,|big brother?<endif>

270.「……えっ？| アバさまが 私を呼んでる？: ...What? Lady Abba wants to see me?

274.「それって ついに アバさまが| オレの錬金術を 頼りにする日が| 来たってこと: So that means the day has finally come for|Elder Abba to rely on my alchemy, huh?!

275.「それって ついに アバさまが| あたしの錬金術を 頼りにする日が| 来たってこ: So that means the day has finally come for|Elder Abba to rely on my alchemy?!

276.「それって ついに アバさまが| 私の錬金術を 頼りにする日が| 来たってこと～: Does that mean the day has finally come for|Elder Abba to rely on my alchemy!?

277.「さあ <pc>！| アバさまの所へ 行こうぜ～！ オレが作った| ぼうしのこと: <pc>! Let's go to Abba's! And don't you|forget the hat I made for you!

278.「さあ <pc>！| アバさまの所へ 行くわよっ！ あたしが作った| ぼうしのこ: Come on, then! We're going to Abba's! And|don't forget about the hat I made for you!

279.<if_woman>「さあ お姉ちゃん！| アバさまの所へ 連れてって～！ 私が: <if_woman>Come on, big sister! Let's go see Abba right|now! Don't forget the hat I made for you!<else>Come on, big brother! Let's go see Abba right|now! Don't forget the hat I made for you!<endif>

289.「まったく！| <kyodai>は 逃げ足だけは速いんだから。: Jeez! <kyodai> sure is a fast runner.

296.「アバさまが 乗っていいって| 言ってくれたんだぜ！: Elder Abba said I could ride with her!

297.「アバさまが 乗っていいって| 言ってくれたのよ！: Elder Abba said I could ride with her!

298.「アバさまが 乗っていいって| 言ってくれたんだ～。: Elder Abba said I could ride with her!

305.「おら！ <pc>も 乗りな乗りな！| ほら オレの手に つかまって……: Come on, <pc>! Get on, get on!|Here, take my hand...

306.「さあ！ <pc>も 乗って乗って！| ほら あたしの手に つかまって……: Come on, <pc>! Get on, get on!|Here, take my hand...

307.<if_woman>「ねえ！ お姉ちゃんも 乗って乗って！| ほら 私の手に つ: <if_woman>Hey, big sister! Get on, get on!|Here, take my hand...<else>Hey, big brother! Get on, get on!|Here, take my hand...<endif>

318.「さよう。テンスの花は われらが 一度も| 足を踏み入れたことのない秘境に咲く。: Of course. The Tens Flowers bloom in a hidden|location where none of you have ever set foot.|Therefore, I will decide who will pick them!

321.「なぜ…… 魔物が 入ってきた……。| 魔物たちの目から村を隠す わしの結界は|: Why...did a monster get in...? What happened|to my barrier that hides this village from the|monsters' sight...?

322.「皆さん 落ち着いてください！| すぐに私たちが テンスの花を採ってきます！: Everyone, please calm down!|We'll go and get the Tens Flowers right away!

326.「なるほど！ 危機を察して| この花を 採りにきたというわけじゃな！？: I see! So you've come to collect these|flowers in your hour of need, is that it?!

328.「キーッヒッヒッヒ！ やっぱりそうか！| こんな大切なことを 忘れ去ってしまうと: Kee-hee-hee! I knew it! The people of Ethene|really are stupid to forget something so|important!

329.「だが 忘れていようがいまいが 関係ない！| エテーネの民は 皆殺しじゃあっ！！: But it doesn't matter whether or not you|forgot! The people of Ethene will all die!

330.「ああぁ……| 今年最後の ハツラツ豆がぁ……。: Ohh... the last of this year's Pep Beans...

332.「わしは それまで 休ませてもらうからな。| シンイよ！ 今度は わしの眠りを|: Until then, I plan on getting some rest.|And Shini! Try not to disturb my sleep this|time!

336.「な…なんなんですか そのお告げは……。| カメさまは 私たちを見捨てるのですか: W...what kind of omen is that...? Is the|Galapagod abandoning us?!

338.「でも テンスの花なんて 聞いたことないわ。: But...I've never even heard of a Tens Flower|before.

340.「よかった…… 安心していいんだねえ。: Thank goodness... I can rest easy now.

342.「魔物が…… 魔物が 村に入ってきた……！: A monster...a monster has entered the|village...!

343.「……オレたち どうなっちまうんだ？| アバさまは 大丈夫だって言ってたけど|: ...What's going to happen to us? Abba said|we'd be okay, but maybe she was right about|our destruction after all...

344.「そうだよ。| アバさまの結界が 破られるなんて……。: You're right. I can't believe the barrier was|broken...

345.<center><pc>よ。|その姿を 選んだのですね。: <pc>.|So, this is the form you have chosen.

347.<if_woman><center>あなたは今日から その女性の身体を借り|新た: <if_woman>From this day forth, you shall assume the body|of this young woman and begin a new life.<else>From this day forth, you shall assume the body|of this young man and begin a new life.<endif>

349.<center>さあ この新しい冒険の書を お持ちなさい。: Now, take this Adventure Log with you.

351.<center>神は その書を持つ あなたの行いを|常に見ています。教会で祈らず: With that book, the gods will always watch|over your actions. Even if you don't pray at a|church, everything shall be recorded there.

352.<center>そして 探すのです。|あなたの使命を。|生まれ変わることの意味を: Seek out your mission. Discover the|purpose of your rebirth...

353.「やっぱり ダメだったじゃないか！| どうしてくれるんだい！！: I knew it wouldn't work! What do you think|you're doing?!

355.<center>あなたたちの島の外には|アストルティアと呼ばれる 広大で偉大な|: Outside your island lies a vast and grand|world known as Astoltia...

356.<center>そこには あなたたち人間の他に|さまざまな姿をした種族が|今も: There exist other races besides you humans|that yet still live there...

357.<center>さあ お行きなさい。|母なる大地 アストルティアへ。: Now, go. To the wondrous world of Astoltia.
